data.name: The Pendant of Prosperity
data.detailed_description:
Your girlfriend Reggie just loves the new necklace you gave her for her birthday, one that you purchased from a quite odd thrift store. Depending on how the night goes things for you and your girlfriend start to get a ‘little’ strange in some BIG ways! The choice is yours in this sexy and sensual adventure that's packed with over 20 exciting endings!

In one path, Reggie’s already awesome breasts might grow in size to beyond busty! Pretty soon she might not be able to leave your apartment building! In another path, Reggie could be stricken with an insatiable hunger, eating and eating all day long! Can you get the necklace off of her before the magic pendant sends her weight gain into the extremes? Will you want to?

You get to decide what happens in this piece of interactive erotic software the wave of the future! Featuring over 20 hand drawn pictures by the awesome artist Saxxon and at over 80,000 words by Adipose Rex this text-based adventure isn’t only read by you, you can have it read to you! Every single chapter and choice features narration, sound effects as well as stars characters fully voice acted by the star of the audio experience, the lovely voice actress Mama Strassa! So prepare for erotic as well as the echoic! Of course, you’re free to pause, replay, or just mute the audio all together if you want! You have the power!

The Pendant of Prosperity is the first in the new U.C.H.E.W.S line of interactive fiction from Earthbound Books! The stories where Users Choices Have Enormously Weighty Significance!
  • Word Count: Over 80,000 words
  • Illustrations: 20 (Including Cover) Drawn by Saxxon
  • Audio Length In Total: Over 6 Hours

data.short_description: An erotic visual novel with multiple endings! Be amazed as the necklace you purchased from a mysterious shop starts to have unbelievably expansive effects on your girlfriend! Read or listen as each chapter of the story is played out, with you holding the power of where the story goes next!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Higher
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Basic
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Defualt

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOs X
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Basic
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: deufalt

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 1.0
  • Processor: Basic
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Basic
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Defualt

content_descriptors.notes:
All pictures are of non-real hand drawn fictional people. Shows woman completely naked specifically her backside and front side. One possible bad ending for the game includes depictions of unwilling mind control and performance of sexual acts. 
Many story line options contain sexual acts between consenting adults.
